snippet.title: The Devil Within: Satgat - Official Gameplay Update Trailer | The MIX Next August 2023
snippet.description:
Take a look at the latest video for The Devil Within: Satgat for a development update on what you can expect from the upcoming action-platformer game, including an upgrade to using Unreal Engine 5.2, updates on new maps, and various improvements like combat mechanics, updates to exploration, a new boss battle, and more. The Devil Within: Satgat will be available on PC, PlayStation, Xbox, and Nintendo Switch.

#IGN
